dct_title_s: Geological map of the region in the vicinity of the Bow and Belly Rivers embracing the Southern portion of the District of Alberta and part of Assiniboia, Northwest Territory George M. Dawson, Geological and Natural History Survey of Canada.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Includes cross section from Coal Creek to Medicine Hat. 1 map: col.; 59 x 66 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dct_creator_sm: Dawson, George Mercer, 1849-1901.,Geological and Natural History Survey of Canada.
